divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside just to smoke and saw what I thought was a large bright star or planet in the sky. I was looking at it when I noticed that it had what looked like dim orbs shooting away from it and fading quickly. I then noticed that the object was growing dimmer and then brighter, and at times would appear wider. I moved out to the darker area of my driveway for a better look, when it appeared that something shot straight up from ground level to the bright object. The best way to describe it was like a shooting star in reverse. Next, it moved a fairly good distance in my direction, and that scared me after the backwards shooting star beam-me-up looking thing I had just seen, so I quickly came in and watched it from the door. Soon it stopped again, so I went out again to look. At this time I had a friend come to my house, and I asked her to look at it. She noticed it's movement and change of shape as well. We also noticed two planes that were flying in a large circle around where the object was located. As far as I know it is still out there, and it is now 9:21.
Summary: Thought it was a star or planet but it moved and has smaller objects coming in and away from it.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
